Html:
Is there anyone out there that would be interested in writing some very very basic tutorial-like documentation for this project? I am willing contribute as a writer but I don't know how and haver never done so before. I could write some examples like how to access sheets using DataSet or such.

I don't know much and I still have a lot of questions myself, like how does excelReader.Read() actually work and how to control it (point to another sheet!!), but I want to help get this more popular and better documented.

It would definitely be useful to have a 'recipe' book of how to do common things. I don't have much time but could work on it with you, I'm just not able to do much myself. I've just checked and I have access to the documentation wiki so I can format and check your work.
